page.title: 04A COUNCILLOR IN WARBLINGTON
page.content: The typical day starts at 7:30am with the early post.Councillor Ralph Cousins receives the agenda for the evening's Council meeting. At 9:30 Ralph Cousins has a phone call from a lady complaining about overgrown trees making the footpath difficult to use,especially mothers with prams.So Ralph takes an instant photograph of the footpath and requests the Parks Department to clear away the offending trees. At 11:00am,there's another phone call from a lady who has problems in getting her car into her driveway because of parked cars.Also,at night,heavy lorries pass her house. After contacting the Council Road Traffic Engineer,they arranged to meet the local residents and discuss their problems.After a long day,Ralph goes home to relax!!!
